about_the_game:
Conquest of Eldinar is an upcoming 2.5D Real Time Strategy and Action game being developed for Steam PC, where you choose from one of 16 different epic fantasy Factions to play as while you build your base, train an army, and engage in thrilling large scale battles. The game supports both dynamic single-player campaigns and competitive online multi-player matches.








The world of Eldinar is a chaotic one, where many different races are constantly in conflict, battling for supremacy. Humans, Elves, Dwarves, Orcs, Dragonkin—the list goes on, each with their own unique cultures, aesthetics, lore, and, of course, arsenals of deadly weapons and spells. Some of these factions are heavily inspired by real-world cultures, while others serve as homages to beloved tropes within the fantasy genre. In Conquest of Eldinar, there is no shortage of exhilarating faction choices, each with its own distinct strengths and weaknesses.








A major feature of the game is its Action Combat. At any time, you can select any unit on the battlefield to take full player control. Each unit in the game possesses a unique set of skills and combat abilities. Defend yourself by blocking blows with your shield, engage in fierce swordplay to dismember your foes, unleash a volley of arrows from your bow, or cast devastating magical spells upon the battlefield.








In Conquest of Eldinar, no two campaigns are alike. Once you have selected one of the game's 16 playable factions and embarked on your quest to conquer the world of Eldinar, you will encounter 15 other factions who share the same goal. You must strategically advance through continents, seize territories, upgrade your faction, and counter your enemies' moves until you establish dominion over the world. The world's conflict is a free-for-all, and when starting a new campaign, there is no certainty as to who your greatest rival will be.








As your war for conquest rages on in the campaign and you win more battles, you will acquire the resources necessary to upgrade and customize your faction to suit your playstyle. Each faction possesses its own unique tech trees for advancement, offering unlockable units, enhanced damage or armor, new spells, abilities, structures, and much more.








At launch, Conquest of Eldinar will feature online 1v1 or 2v2 multiplayer battles where you can prove your mettle against real foes. Choose your faction and join online matchmaking to engage in thrilling matches against other players, whether in casual or competitive ranked games. Climb to the top of your faction's leaderboards and assert your supremacy as your faction's representative in the worldwide battle for dominance.








The game will offer a diverse range of unlockable content for your profile, such as new character skins, profile icons, emotes, placeable banners, and more. You can acquire these items using in-game currency obtained through victorious battles in singleplayer or multiplayer modes. These unlockable items can be used in both modes of play.

content_descriptors.notes: Conquest of Eldinar does depict stylized fantasy violence while in combat. Units on the battlefield can be dismembered and slain producing a variety of blood effects like splatters and pools of blood on the ground. All of these graphics options will be toggle-able in the in-game menus so no, blood is not mandatory. However visceral action combat with weapons such as swords or guns will always be a core element of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
